question:
[Michael] was thrilled his brother, [Peter], was able to make it to the party. [Carmelita] spent a great day shopping with her daughter, [Martha]. [Brandi] watched a golf tournament with her aunt [Elizabeth]. [Chuck] and [Elizabeth] got married in Hawaii. [Martha] and her son, [Mark], went to the park to fly a kite. They had fun doing it all day. [Brandi] planned a trip to the zoo for her brother, [Michael]. They had a great time. [Peter] asked his brother [Mark] if he would come help him fix his car next weekend.
Question: How is [Chuck] related to [Carmelita]?
